[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ inner_shadow=”on” fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ background_color_gradient_direction=”120deg” background_image=”https://www.jacouleengineering.com//wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Oil-Gas-Engineer_Uncompressed.jpg” parallax=”on” parallax_method=”off” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ locked=”off”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”ABOUT US” logo_image_url=”https://www.jacouleengineering.com//wp-content/uploads/2020/02/logo_page.png” content_max_width=”60%” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ title_font=”Montserrat|900|||||||” title_font_size=”54px” content_font=”|300|||||||” content_text_align=”left” content_font_size=”34px” content_letter_spacing=”16px” background_enable_color=”off” title_font_size_tablet=”48px” title_font_size_phone=”38px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_shadow_style=”preset1″][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ custom_padding_tablet=”70px||70px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”50px||50px||false|false” bottom_divider_style=”mountains2″ bottom_divider_color=”#398532″ bottom_divider_height=”54px”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″ min_height=”513px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://www.jacouleengineering.com//wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Safety9-1.jpg” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ custom_margin=”||25px||false|false” animation_style=”fold” animation_delay=”100ms”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ text_text_color=”#a8a8a8″ text_font_size=”15px” header_3_font=”|700|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#ffffff” header_3_font_size=”23px” header_3_line_height=”1.1em” header_4_font=”|800|||||||” header_4_text_color=”#e0011a” header_4_font_size=”42px” background_color=”#1a1d24″ custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|false” animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”200ms”]

“Excellence is our Watch Word. We recognise it’s not a skill, but an Attitude.“

We persistently strive to be better in all our operations and service delivery.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ text_font=”Montserrat|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_letter_spacing=”2px” background_color=”#398532″ width=”31%” width_tablet=”26%” width_phone=”41%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_margin=”||17px||false|false” custom_padding=”2px|18px|2px|18px|true|false” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right”]

WHO WE ARE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”15px” header_5_font=”Quicksand|500|||||||” header_5_text_color=”#000000″ header_5_line_height=”2em” text_orientation=”justified” custom_margin=”-8px||||false|false”]

Jacoule Engineering Limited (JEL) was incorporated in 2008, under the laws of the Nigerian Corporate Affairs Commission (CAC).

Since inception, our focus has been to provide a diverse array of quality solutions to our customers in the upstream sector of the Oil & Gas industry in Nigeria and the West African Region.

These services range from Engineering, Procurement, Construction, Project Management, Facility Maintenance, Pipeline Maintenance to Well services and Vessel Chartering.

NOGL strives for excellence in everything we do by adhering to a high standard of professionalism and enforcing firm safety culture which guarantees an innocuous work environment for our people.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.jacouleengineering.com//wp-content/uploads/2020/02/logo_page.png” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”40px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” animation_style=”slide” animation_delay=”200ms”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″ background_color=”#1a1d24″ custom_margin=”30px||||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_blurb title=”Our Vision” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%101%%” icon_color=”#7cda24″ icon_placement=”left” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”50px” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_level=”h2″ header_font=”Roboto Condensed|700|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”20px” body_font=”Montserrat||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#ffffff” body_line_height=”1.8em” animation_style=”fade” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”300ms”]

Our Vision is to be a globally recognised Oil Service Company offering quality services safely, on budget and on time.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_blurb title=”Our Mission” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%166%%” icon_color=”#7cda24″ icon_placement=”left” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”50px” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_level=”h2″ header_font=”Roboto Condensed|700|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”20px” body_font=”Montserrat||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#ffffff” body_line_height=”1.8em” animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”350ms” locked=”off”]

To provide world class Engineering solutions to our esteemed client in a safe environment.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_blurb title=”Our Core Values” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%57%%” icon_color=”#7cda24″ icon_placement=”left” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”50px” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_level=”h2″ header_font=”Roboto Condensed|700|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”20px” body_font=”Montserrat||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#ffffff” body_line_height=”1.8em” animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”400ms” locked=”off”]

Our Core Values are  founded on Integrity, Customer Satisfaction, Team work, Safety and Quality Service Delivery.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ inner_shadow=”on” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ background_color=”#1a1d24″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_module=”6176″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ width=”90%” max_width=”90%”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_blurb icon_alignment=”left” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_text_color=”#7cda24″ body_text_color=”#ffffff”]

JACOULE Oil & Gas

We offer Professional Engineering, Procurement, Construction, Installation (EPCI), Marine and Logistics services.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_blurb icon_alignment=”left” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_text_color=”#7cda24″ body_text_color=”#ffffff”]

CONTACT US

#19, Jerry Iriabe Street,
Off Bashorun Okunsaya,
Lekki Phase 1, Lagos, Nigeria.

Plot 68, Stadium Rd,
Port Harcourt,
Rivers State, Nigera.

Phone:
+234 (809) 600-0900

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_blurb icon_alignment=”left” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_text_color=”#7cda24″ body_text_color=”#ffffff”]

WORKING HOURS

Monday – Friday:
8.30am – 5.30pm

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ ul_text_color=”#9e9fa3″]
